Please press on \'Read QR-Code\' button and use your camera to scan a QR-Code.
The QR-Code that you previously scanned has configured this app to collect particular types of data. These include:
Please press \'OK\' if you are happy with this data being collected. If not contact the research and please be prepared to withdraw from the study if you feel it is necessary.
The only remaining step is to send off the data to the researcher via email. Do you wish to send the data at this point?
There was a problem reading the QR-Code. Can you please scan the code again

The developer of this app has done his upmost to secure the data (which has previously been described) that this app collects. This was done by encrypting the data, securely storing the encrypted data, restricting any access to the data, devising a complex security key to protect the encrypted and inaccessible data, securing this security key among other measures. However, it is important that you do not participate in this study if your phone is rooted (jail-broken) or that you believe that the normal Android security on your phone is compromised. Additionally, your data can not and will not be exported without you manually emailing/exporting the data yourself. I have made every effort to give you complete control of your data.
In order to participate you will have to provide the following permissions:
To configure this app for the scientific study which you are participating in, a QR-Code will need to be scanned. For this, you will need to allow the app to access the phone\'s camera.

The experiment that you are involved in requires you to provide usage permission. Usage permission will allow the app to monitor what you have used your phone for (what apps you\'ve used and when the screen has been on/off up to the last 5 days). This feature allows to see what apps you continue to use as well.

The experiment that you are involved in requires you to provide Notification permission. Notification permission means that the app will know when you have received notifications and when you have deleted it.
All essential permissions needed

All permissions given
This app is for researching for scientific research, if you are not participating in scientific research please uninstall this app.

Usage logger is an app that helps scientists identify what you are using your phone for. Please do not use this app for any other purpose, if you have been asked to use this app for purposes unrelated to scientific research then please uninstall it now. At this point no data has been collected.
- What apps are installed on your phone.
- What permissions that the installed apps on your phone request.
- How you have previously responded to app\'s request for permission requests
- What you have previously used your phone for across the past

days. This will include: when the screen was used and when apps were used. No information will be collected on what you did with the apps. However, inferences may be made regarding what you could have done with these apps
- How you will use your phone in the future. This will include:
- When the phone is off or on
- When the screen is off or on
- What apps you use and when you use them
- When an app sends you a notification and when you delete the notification
- When you change the apps installed
